content: ही {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} An interjection of {@--1@} Surprise (ah!); हतीवीधलसितानां ही विचित्रो विपाकः <ls>Śi. 11. 64</ls>; or ही चित्रं लक्ष्मणेनोचे <ls>Bk. 14. 39</ls>; (often repeated in theatrical language in this sense). {@--2@} Fatigue, despondency or sorrow. {@--3@} Reason (<ab>cf.</ab> हि).
